snippet: The trial of Andre Robinson, who has pleaded not guilty to a misdemeanor animal cruelty charge in a case that has drawn wide attention, was postponed until later this month.
abstract: Andre Robinson, Brooklyn man who was charged with kicking a cat, pleads not guilty to misdemeanor animal cruelty charge; attack was captured on video that later went viral.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Andre Robinson, who has pleaded not guilty to a misdemeanor animal cruelty charge in a case that has drawn wide attention, was postponed until later this month.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man Who Kicked Cat Says He Shouldn’t Go to Jail
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Kicking Cat Says He Shouldn’t Go to Jail
